channel.title: Data on xxcdu_blog
channel.description: Recent content in Data on xxcdu_blog

item.title: Hugo-github常见问题
item.description: 1、github部署hugo博客后，可能出现文章地址被重定向到localhost的情况，这时需要在仓库中将index.html和index.xml中的文章url改为仓库url，即../post/….. 2、若在github远端修改仓库代码，则在将public push时可能会出现：error: failed to push some refs to ‘https://github.com/xxcdu/xxcdu.github.io/' hint: Updates were rejected because the tip of your current branch is behind hint: its remote counterpart.

item.title: start-hugo
item.description: 条件：配置好git，下载hugo，将hugo所在目录放入环境变量 1、创建网站：hugo new site /path/to/site 2、克隆主题：git clone https://github.com/vaga/hugo-theme-m10c.git themes/m10c（具体方式看主题中的介绍） 主题网址：https://themes.gohugo.io/ 下载主题后进入hugo.
